casebody.data:
No. 10-284. City of Colton, California, Petitioner v. American Promotional Events, Inc.-West, et al. 562 U.S. 1062, 131 S. Ct. 646,

178 L. Ed. 2d 480,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9102. November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 614 F.3d 998 and 390 Fed. Appx. 749.
